name: DownchimneySimulator20X7
description:
Help thumbs help Santa save Christmas. Inspired by yuletide and Downwell!

Diversifier: The Great Gatling Gunsby

Clearly based on the epic poem Twas the Night Before Christmas by Clement Clarke Moore.

DownchimneyStandalone Controls:

Please run in windowed mode.(AKA not fullscreen)

A, Left Arrow- Left

D, Right Arrow- Right

Space- Jump/Shoot

Esc- Pause

*Controller supported as well.

DownchimneySimulator20X7 Controls:

*Simulator had some resolution issues with builds so that's why the IU is messed up, if you want something pretty see standalone*

Q- Left Thumb Flail Left

W- Left Thumb Flail Right

A, Left Arrow- Left

D, Right Arrow- Right

Space- Jump/Shoot

O- Tilt Down

P- Tilt Up

J- Grasp Left

K- Grasp Right
